USE nyc_taxi_discovery;
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01',
        'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=03'),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result];


SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result];

    -- Metadata functions

    SELECT
    result.filename() as file_name,
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result];

SELECT
    result.filename() as file_name,
    count(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS result
    group by result.filename()
    order by result.filename();

    -- filter by filename

SELECT
    result.filename() as file_name,
    count(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS result
    WHERE result.filename() in ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv','green_tripdata_2020-02.csv')
    group by result.filename()
    order by result.filename();

-- Metadata file_path

SELECT
    result.filepath() as file_path,
    result.filepath(1) as year,
    result.filepath(2) as month,
    result.filename() as file_name,
    count(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS result
    group by result.filepath(),result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2), result.filename()
    order by result.filepath(),result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2),result.filename();

    --use file_path in where clause


    SELECT
    result.filepath() as file_path,
    result.filepath(1) as year,
    result.filepath(2) as month,
    result.filename() as file_name,
    count(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS result
   -- where result.filepath(1) =2020 
     --    and result.filepath(2) in ('06','07','08')
    group by result.filepath(),result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2), result.filename()
    order by result.filepath(),result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2),result.filename();

SELECT
    result.filepath() as file_path,
    result.filename() as file_name,
    count(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=06/*.csv',
        'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=07/*.csv',
        'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=08/*.csv'
        ),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS result
   -- where result.filepath(1) =2020 
     --    and result.filepath(2) in ('06','07','08')
    group by result.filepath(), result.filename()
    order by result.filepath(),result.filename();
